name: OR_IMP_DESC
description: The OR_IMP_DESC table contains OR management system implant descriptions.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the implant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the description information for the implant.

columns.name: DESCRIPTION
columns.description: One line of description of the implant record.
